update-gaurantee__text.message: Support us with confidence: 60 day money-back guarantee. And you can keep Adblock Plus.

update-payment-reward__1-month.message: Nice! A 35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for one month. Thanks for your support.

update-payment-reward__n-months.message: Nice! A 35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for 8 months. Thanks for your support.

update-payment-reward__1-year.message: Nice! A 35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for one year. Thanks for your support.

update-payment-reward__n-years.message: Nice! A 35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for 8 years. Thanks for your support.

update-payment-reward.message: Nice! A 35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium. Thanks for your support.

update-payment-reward__text.message: Nice! A $35.00 contribution gets Adblock Plus Premium for one year. Thanks for your support.

new__paragraph-1-unrestricted.message: We’re working hard to make Adblock Plus more valuable for you by increasing the number of ads, distractions, and trackers we block. We’re also evolving in the way we ask users like you to support us — our goal is to make Adblock Plus Premium more valuable for you, and to ask you to support us by becoming Premium users. Adblock Plus Premium will enhance your internet experience by blocking additional distractions, cookie banners, and more. Thank you for your support!

new__paragraph-2-unrestricted.message: Here’s a little about what we’ve been working on lately:

new__paragraph-1-restricted.message: We’re working hard to make the Adblock Plus extension more valuable for you. Here’s a little about what we’ve been doing lately:

new__item-1__paragraph-1.message: Our latest update now gives us the ability to block ads in Japanese and Turkish. If you’d like to block ads in these languages, simply enable these filter lists by heading to Settings and adding a new language filter list.

new__item-2__paragraph-1.message: We’ve invested in our infrastructure in the face of future internet changes like Manifest V3. With this update, we’re working to ensure that Adblock Plus continues to provide users with a better internet experience now and beyond.

new__item-3__paragraph-1.message: You know those pesky pop-ups that ask you to accept cookies on every website? With Adblock Plus Premium, you can now block those pop-ups while we reject any cookies that we can on your behalf. For more on this feature, check out our blog post here.

whats-new-support.message: Need to report an issue? Reach out to us via social media, email or the user forum.

update-section-1-column-1__paragraph-2.message: Our mission at Adblock Plus is to create a worry-free and distraction-free internet for everyone. That’s why we developed our extension to block pop-ups, annoying ads, and other distractions across the web. Adblock Plus helps you to browse the web faster, safer, and with more control over your internet experience.

update-section-1-column-1__paragraph-3.message: Adblock Plus is also free of charge to users, as we believe that everyone should have access to a better internet experience. That’s why many users choose to contribute to our efforts. If you believe in what we do and want to help us on our journey, you can do so below. Together, we can make the internet a better place for everyone!

update-section-1-column-1__paragraph-4.message: Sincerely, The Adblock Plus Team
